name: Annoyed Mask
description: When you encounter a very annoying, funny and annoying thing, you can wear the mask which is only used in this way.

name: Annoyed Mask Blueprint
description: When you encounter a very annoying, funny and annoying thing, you can wear the mask which is only used in this way.

name: Ant Hell Material Pack
description: Ant Hell Material Pack, in which all kinds of Ant Hell materials can be found.

name: Antenna
description: Antennas that come from some monsters or insects are rare items that can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Antidote
description: The drugs developed by Prontera scholars, it can relieve the toxic effect and restore certain HP.

name: Antlers
description: Hairband made according to the antler. Its strength is to have higher Def.

name: Antlers [1]
description: Hairband made according to the antler. Its strength is to have higher Def.

name: Antlers [1] Blueprint
description: Hairband made according to the antler. Its strength is to have higher Def.

name: Aori Ramen (old)[1]
description: [AORI travels all over the world just to find her father.]

name: Aori Ramen Recipe
description: "I hope that everyone in the world will have the opportunity to enjoy this yummy Aori ramen." (It's said that it's likely to grasp how to produce the ramen hat when cooking the ramen.)

name: Aori Ramen [1]
description: [AORI travels all over the world just to find her father.]

name: Aori Ramen [1] Blueprint
description: [AORI travels all over the world just to find her father.]

name: Aori·Wishing Card
description: [Hope people all around the world could taste wonderful noddle, someone's wish could be heard]

name: Apology & Gratitude Premium
description: In order to thank all adventurers who helped, Encouraged and bore with us during the "free test", we've prepare a "Premium"for you only that is independent from monthly Premium. Millions of thanks!

name: Apology Box
description: A box that expresses sincere apologies to Big Cats! There is a large probability of finding advanced materials in it, as well as Apology Hood which is only kept in Apology Box.

name: Apology Box 2.0
description: A box that expresses sincere apologies to Big Cats! There is a large probability of finding advanced materials in it, as well as Apology Hood which is only kept in Apology Box.

name: Apology Box 3.0
description: A box that expresses sincere apologies to Big Cats! There is a large probability of finding advanced materials in it, as well as Apology Hood which is only kept in Apology Box.

name: Apology Hood
description: Big cat who invented the beautiful adventure world wanted to express moments of respect, tolerance, and understanding via the headdress. When you see it everyday, it reminds you to keep creating more lovely contents for the world, in order to support all of our adventurers!
